mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, payMode, capitalId, useInterest, useDays, tsc, tsu
mapper.select:
select
huikuanmap.amount as huikuanmap_amount,
huikuan.id as huikuan_id, huikuan.orderId as huikuan_orderId, huikuan.hsId as huikuan_hsId, huikuan.huikuanCompanyId, huikuan.huikuanDate, huikuan.huikuanAmount, huikuan.huikuanUsage, huikuan.huikuanMode, huikuan.huikuanBankPaper, huikuan.huikuanBankPaperDate, huikuan.huikuanBankDiscount, huikuan.huikuanBankDiscountRate, huikuan.huikuanBankPaperExpire, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaper, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaperDate, huikuan.huikuanBusinessDiscount, huikuan.huikuanBusinessDiscountRate, huikuan.huikuanBusinessPaperExpire, huikuan.tsc as huikuan_tsc, huikuan.tsu as huikuan_tsu,
huankuanmap.principal, huankuanmap.amount as huankuanmap_amount,
huankuan.id as huankuan_id, huankuan.orderId as huankuan_orderId, huankuan.hsId as huankuan_hsId, huankuan.skCompanyId, huankuan.huankuankDate, huankuan.huankuanAmount, huankuan.huankuanInterest, huankuan.huankuanFee, huankuan.tsc as huankuan_tsc, huankuan.tsu as huankuan_tsu
from hs_ying_fukuan fukuan LEFT JOIN hs_ying_huikuan_map huikuanmap on fukuan.id = huikuanmap.fukuanId LEFT JOIN hs_ying_huikuan huikuan on huikuanmap.huikuanId = huikuan.id
LEFT JOIN hs_ying_huankuan_map huankuanmap on fukuan.id = huankuanmap.fukuanId LEFT JOIN hs_ying_huankuan huankuan on huankuanmap.huankuanId = huankuan.id
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0

select
from hs_ying_fukuan where orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted = 0 order by payDate asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hs_ying_fukuan ( id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, payMode, capitalId, useInterest, useDays, tsc, tsu ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, current_timestamp )

insert into hs_ying_fukuan
id, orderId, hsId, payDate, receiveCompanyId, payUsage, payAmount, payMode, capitalId, useInterest, useDays, tsc, tsc, tsu,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tsu,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: UPDATE hs_ying_fukuan SET orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payDate = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receiveCompanyId = #{receiveCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, payUsage = #{payUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payAmount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, payMode = #{payMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capitalId = #{capitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, useInterest = #{useInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, useDays = #{useDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
